title: Urticaria (hives)
body:
You were treated today for urticaria (hives).

Antihistamine plan:
{{antihistamine}}

{{#if trigger_avoidance}}Trigger avoidance: {{trigger_avoidance}}

{{/if}}Return to ED urgently if you develop:
- Swelling of the lips, tongue, or throat
- Trouble breathing or wheezing
- Dizziness, fainting, or widespread swelling

Follow-up: {{followup_timeframe}}.
disclaimer: This letter is general advice and does not replace follow-up with your usual clinician.
